channel.title: READ! Need help on server
channel.description:
Hi. I have been studying hard on how to start a server. I have the complier, runserver.bat stuff fine and the no-ip. problem is that when I tried to log on my server IP, it dosent work. I checked my IP host on no-ip DUC, i edited client.java to my server name.
Please help me out on what seems to be my problem.
Thank you so much

item.title: READ! Need help on server
item.dc:creator: @erko321 erko321
item.description:
@erko321 wrote:

use 127.0.0.1 or localhost for ip

Read full topic
